|--------------|-------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|
| `scheme1://` | [Shortcut Link](https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/xxx) | Used for opening the main app interface |
| `scheme2://` | _(No shortcut)_                                       | Used for search                         |
